startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: URLs to start with. The actor currently supports basic category URLs such as `https://www.zalando.co.uk/womens-clothing/` and URLs of their subcategories.

maxItems.title: Max items
maxItems.description: Set the maximum number of items you want to scrape. If you leave this field unset, the actor will extract all available items.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use either automatic Apify proxies or your own.
